Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.floj.core.listeners.BlockChainListener
    org.floj.core.listeners.PeerConnectionEventListener
    Use the single event interfaces instead
    org.floj.wallet.listeners.WalletEventListener
    Use the superinterfaces directly instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.floj.core.listeners.AbstractBlockChainListener
    org.floj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerConnectionEventListener
    org.floj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerDataEventListener
    org.floj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerEventListener
    org.floj.wallet.listeners.AbstractWalletEventListener
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.floj.uri.FLOURI.BITCOIN_SCHEME
    org.floj.script.ScriptOpCodes.OP_NOP2
    org.floj.core.Transaction.SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY_VALUE
    Instead use SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.value or SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.byteValue() as appropriate.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.floj.core.PeerGroup.addEventListener(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.floj.core.Peer.addEventListener(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.floj.core.PeerGroup.addEventListener(AbstractPeerEventListener, Executor)
    org.floj.core.Peer.addEventListener(AbstractPeerEventListener, Executor)
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.addEventListener(WalletEventListener, Executor)
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.addKey(ECKey)
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.addKeys(List<ECKey>)
    org.floj.core.AbstractBlockChain.addListener(BlockChainListener)
    org.floj.core.AbstractBlockChain.addListener(BlockChainListener, Executor)
    org.floj.core.PeerGroup.awaitRunning()
    org.floj.core.PeerGroup.awaitTerminated()
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates(boolean)
    Use Wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates(boolean, boolean) or the zero-parameter form instead.
    org.floj.script.Script.correctlySpends(Transaction, long, Script)
    Use Script.correctlySpends(org.floj.core.Transaction, long, org.floj.script.Script, java.util.Set) instead so that verification flags do not change as new verification options are added.
    org.floj.core.Sha256Hash.create(byte[])
    org.floj.core.Sha256Hash.createDouble(byte[])
    org.floj.crypto.TransactionSignature.decodeFromFLO(byte[], boolean)
    use #decodeFromFLO(byte[], boolean, boolean instead}.
    org.floj.script.Script.executeScript(Transaction, long, Script, LinkedList<byte[]>, boolean)
    Use Script.executeScript(org.floj.core.Transaction, long, org.floj.script.Script, java.util.LinkedList, java.util.Set) instead.
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.getChangeAddress()
    use Wallet.currentChangeAddress() instead.
    org.floj.core.TransactionInput.getFromAddress()
    org.floj.script.Script.getFromAddress(NetworkParameters)
    org.floj.core.PeerGroup.getMemoryPool()
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.getWatchedBalance()
    Use Wallet.getBalance() instead as including watched balances is now the default behaviour
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.getWatchedBalance(CoinSelector)
    Use Wallet.getBalance(CoinSelector) instead as including watched balances is now the default behaviour
    org.floj.script.Script.isSentToP2SH()
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.maybeDoMaintenance(KeyParameter, boolean)
    Renamed to doMaintenance
    org.floj.core.NetworkParameters.prodNet()
    org.floj.core.NetworkParameters.regTests()
    org.floj.core.PeerGroup.removeEventListener(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.floj.core.Peer.removeEventListener(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.floj.wallet.Wallet.removeEventListener(WalletEventListener)
    use the fine-grain event listeners instead.
    org.floj.core.AbstractBlockChain.removeListener(BlockChainListener)
    org.floj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet()
    org.floj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet2()
    org.floj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet3()
    org.floj.core.NetworkParameters.unitTests()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.floj.core.Address(NetworkParameters, String)
    Use Address.fromBase58(NetworkParameters, String)
    org.floj.crypto.BIP38PrivateKey(NetworkParameters, String)
    Use BIP38PrivateKey.fromBase58(NetworkParameters, String)
    org.floj.core.Block(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    Use MessageSerializer.makeBlock(byte[]) instead.
    org.floj.core.ChildMessage()
    Use {@link #ChildMessage(NetworkParameters) instead.
    org.floj.core.DumpedPrivateKey(NetworkParameters, String)
    Use DumpedPrivateKey.fromBase58(NetworkParameters, String)
    org.floj.core.ECKey(BigInteger, byte[], boolean)
    org.floj.core.ECKey(byte[], byte[])
    org.floj.core.ECKey(EncryptedData, byte[], KeyCrypter)
    org.floj.core.Sha256Hash(byte[])
    org.floj.core.Sha256Hash(String)
